personalInfo.name: John Smith
personalInfo.title: Senior Front-End Engineer & AI/ML Integration Specialist

summary: AI Augmented developer and Cloud Native engineer with 10+ years of React expertise, far exceeding the 2-year requirement. Background in machine learning enhances development workflow, bringing advanced problem-solving to frontend architecture. Deep experience with required stack (TypeScript, MUI, Redux, GraphQL) plus extensive testing expertise. Strong track record implementing authentication, real-time features, and performance optimization. Proven leadership in Agile environments with emphasis on accessible, secure, and scalable solutions.

achievements: Built training and inference pipelines in React.js/Next.js and Python
Created vision-action model that navigates web interfaces like human QA workers
Developed simple English instruction system replacing esoteric testing code
Built AI-powered testing framework replacing complex headless testing systems
Built training and inference pipelines in React.js/Next.js, TypeScript and Python
Built real-time voice processing handling complex speech patterns
Engineered advanced voice synthesis system solving cadence replication problems
Created voice models capturing natural speaking rhythm of recording artists
